name: Paisano Zero
description:
Mama Mia! You're just a humble chef at the local pizza joint, and all of a sudden: You are the first victim of a new zombie virus! 

.......but bills don't pay themselves. Back to work!

Fight Corruption with Corruption!

In Paisano Zero, you work to keep up with your business that's in high demand while also keeping your corrupting illness at bay! Make orders flawlessly for your customers,  while potentially spreading your virus to corrupt mafia members who dare step foot in YOUR store.  Press the "goober button" (picture of a zombie chef) before serving mafia members to boost the number of people you serve (your high score). Try and serve as many loyal customers as you can, cook 'till you drop!

Endless mechanic

Watch out! Your Corruption meter is rising every second, and if it fills, you'll lose! Keep it at bay with an injection of that good ol' pizza sauce under your desk (or by goobering all over some mafia pizza >:D)

Keep in mind that orders are immediately followed by the next, so stay frosty.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first solo Game Dev Venture, first experience with Godot, and first solo game jam.

Although I wasn't able to achieve everything I wanted before the deadline closed in due to a multitude of reasons, I feel like I learned a lot.

If you can, I hope you enjoy the game (even though there is no sound)  (;_;)

Fonts used are from :  https://bsl.itch.io/new-hi-score
